aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon's Technology and Strategic Investments
Amazon believes advances in technology will improve users' internet experience and increase internet ubiquity in people's lives.
Amazon believes reduced cost of processing power contributes to technology advances.
Amazon believes improved data storage contributes to technology advances.
Amazon believes enhanced analytics capabilities contribute to technology advances.
Amazon believes improved wireless connectivity contributes to technology advances.
Amazon believes practical applications of artificial intelligence contribute to technology advances.
Amazon believes practical applications of machine learning contribute to technology advances.
Amazon is investing in AWS to take advantage of continued advances in technology.
AWS is Amazon Web Services.
AWS offers on-demand technology services to developers.
AWS offers on-demand technology services to enterprises of all sizes.
AWS provides compute services.
AWS provides storage services.
AWS provides database services.
AWS provides analytics services.
AWS provides machine learning services.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to build innovative software.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to deploy innovative software.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to build efficient software.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to deploy efficient software.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to build innovative electronic devices.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to deploy innovative electronic devices.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to build efficient electronic devices.
Amazon is investing in initiatives to deploy efficient electronic devices.
Amazon is investing in development of a satellite network for global broadband service.
Amazon is investing in development of autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing services.
Amazon seeks to efficiently manage shareholder dilution.
Amazon maintains flexibility to issue shares for strategic purposes.
Strategic purposes for Amazon issuing shares include financings.
Strategic purposes for Amazon issuing shares include acquisitions.
Strategic purposes for Amazon issuing shares include aligning employee compensation with shareholders' interests.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/

text:
We believe that advances in technology, specifically the speed and reduced cost of processing power, data storage and analytics, improved wireless connectivity, and the practical applications of artificial intelligence and machine learning, will continue to improve usersâ€™ experience on the internet and increase its ubiquity in peopleâ€™s lives. To best take advantage of these continued advances in technology, we are investing in AWS, which offers a broad set of on-demand technology services, including compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning, and other services to developers and enterprises of all sizes. We are also investing in initiatives to build and deploy innovative and efficient software and electronic devices as well as other initiatives including the development of a satellite network for global broadband service and autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing services.

We seek to efficiently manage shareholder dilution while maintaining the flexibility to issue shares for strategic purposes, such as financings, acquisitions, and aligning employee compensation with shareholdersâ€™ interests.
